member.name: IESHORTCUTFLAGS
member.summary: Specifies how a shortcut should be handled by the browser.

member.name: IESHORTCUTFLAGS.IESHORTCUT_NEWBROWSER
member.summary: A new browser window should be opened for each shortcut.

member.name: IESHORTCUTFLAGS.IESHORTCUT_OPENNEWTAB
member.summary: The current or topmost browser window should open the link in a new foreground tab.

member.name: IESHORTCUTFLAGS.IESHORTCUT_FORCENAVIGATE
member.summary: The current or topmost browser window should open the link.

member.name: IESHORTCUTFLAGS.IESHORTCUT_BACKGROUNDTAB
member.summary: The current or topmost browser window should open the link in a new background tab.
